div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
CodeDisplay
84100007History taking

Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
CodeDisplay
101720-1Disability status
95385-1Caregiver for person with age-related complaints, chronic diseases or frailty

description.value: Estas son algunas de las observaciones que se pueden realizar en un encuentro, que permiten dar antecedentes a la interconsulta.
